CustomField.inlineHelpText: 1.Change in Placement should be used when a child is physically moving to a different placement/provider 2.Change in Placement Structure should be used when a child is not physically moving to a different placement/provider but the structure is changing (i.e. from Regular Foster Care to Pre-Adoptive Home) 3.Permanently Leaving Custody and Care should be used when a child is exiting foster care (Commitment Rescinded or changed to an Order of Protective Supervision)
CustomField.label: Exit Type
